summary:
As the Head of Procurement - Business Operations at Nutreco, I am dedicated to driving business growth through strategic procurement synergies, digitalisation, and optimisation. With a profound passion for consulting, I have honed my expertise over the past 11 years, successfully delivering strategies for Operations, Business Development, Marketing, and Procurement across diverse B2B and B2C industries.

My professional journey has taken me across three continents, immersing myself in dynamic business environments in Asia, Europe, and South America. Having traveled to over 30 countries, I have gained invaluable insights into global markets and cultivated a deep appreciation for diverse cultures.

My educational background includes an MBA in General Management from Germany's esteemed No. 1 B-School, equipping me with a comprehensive understanding of business principles and strategic management. Furthermore, I hold a degree in Electrical Engineering from one of India's top technology universities, providing me with a strong technical foundation.

With fluency in four languages—English, Hindi, Spanish, and German—I am adept at effectively communicating and collaborating with individuals from various linguistic backgrounds. This skill enables me to forge meaningful connections and foster international business relationships.

Beyond my professional pursuits, I am an advanced scuba certified diver, constantly seeking new adventures and challenges. This passion reflects my adventurous spirit, adaptability, and commitment to pushing boundaries.

If you are seeking a results-driven professional with a proven track record in driving business growth, and leveraging a diverse skill set to deliver impactful strategies, I invite you to connect with me. Let's explore new possibilities and contribute to the success of your organisation together.

projects:
[{'title': 'Spare Part Procurement and ERP interlinking - €7 million project', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'description': '- Supervised a team of 12 to categorise and catalogue the details of 50,000 spare parts
- Defined strategies for procuring Spare Parts for the Entire Factory
- Optimised the requirement of Requirements of different departments within the Factory thereby reducing the inventory cost by 25%
- Managed the ERP linkage of the spares with the SAP 
- Developed strong customer supplier relationship', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ashish', 'last_name': 'M.', 'name': None, 'headline': 'General Management | Strategy'}]}, {'title': 'Improve productivity by reducing frequent downtime issues at Michelin Ballymena, UK', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'description': '- Developed and implemented zero to low cost ( value less than €100) solutions to reduce the downtime of machines thereby improving the productivity by 12%
-Analysed the Data of Electrical and Mechanical failures occurring in machines over the past several years to identify areas of improvement.
- Defined the methodology to be followed while finding the hidden penalising machines ( Breakdown time too less but frequency too high)
- Interacted with international stakeholders to identify the best practises', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ashish', 'last_name': 'M.', 'name': None, 'headline': 'General Management | Strategy'}]}, {'title': 'Reducing Energy Consumption of semi-finished goods department of Michelin Ballymena,UK', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'description': '- Audited the Shop floor to identify areas of improvement in terms of Energy( Electricity, Steam, Compressed air) Consumption Reduction.
- Developed the framework to reduce energy loss during transmission and consumption of energy during several processes.
- Implemented cost efficient solutions thereby reducing energy consumption by 8%.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ashish', 'last_name': 'M.', 'name': None, 'headline': 'General Management | Strategy'}]}, {'title': 'Developing a Reservoir Operation Policy using  Bayesian Stochastic Dynamic Programming', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'description': 'The main objective of the project is to develop a robust operation policy for a reservoir using Bayesian Stochastic Dynamic Programming and Artificial Neural Networks for maximizing the total energy generated by the hydro-power plant on month wise basis.
                The results obtained from independent analysis will be compared with the results obtained from Markov-I analysis and that the latter is better than the former will also be proved.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ashish', 'last_name': 'M.', 'name': None, 'headline': 'General Management | Strategy'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ashish', 'last_name': 'G.', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Director of Engineering at PNC'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Deependra Kumar', 'last_name': 'Jha', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Transforming higher education through Technology | Chief Academic Officer | Former Vice Chancellor'}]}]
